ygData.subject: Re: Guild Matters
ygData.msgSnippet: I on guide assignment now. So that s another reason why I m MIA. Just leave a note on ICQ if you need a group Zan. I log in these days to Inno only base on
ygData.messageBody:
I on guide assignment now. So that's another reason why I'm MIA. Just
leave a note on ICQ if you need a group Zan. I log in these days to Inno
only base on request.

About the guild, that's why I called a meeting on Saturday, too bad it
was heavily screwed up.......

Synzzz wrote:

> Hello all, I think it's time something is done about our guild. We
> either need more ppl or we need more guild events.Probably the
> former.Problem is Ziltus and Leshrec no longer play their wizards.
> Fesse is also semi retired.I already have problems finding ppl to
> group with as it has been last few weeks. Also we dont seem to
> havemuch of an enthusiasm. No offence but i think some things need
> fixing. Or maybe i'm the only one feeling it hmm... Unlike a few
> guilds i've come to know...we really haven't had much of a union as a
> guild. Lvls pobably play onepart as it prevents effective guild
> outings. Other is we seem to have bad luck with any so far hehe. I'd
> like and hope to see something good that can be done for us all...if
> not maybe one day i might just leave..no offence i like you guys but i
> need to be able to have some fun too..it's hardly fun anymore now for
> me.I'll still be on mailing list if i ever leave and i will still give
> my best at providing any info that no one might haveor help if i ever
> can... Of course that's only if i leave (which is unlikely) but i'd
> thought i just bring it up to you all to be fair...Thaks for your
> time Zanderion Stormseekerlvl 36 mage and yes double xp penalty for
> dying after every hell lvl...ARGH!just found that out when one whole
> bubble disappeared
